name: Selang
damage_resistances: bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing from nonmagical attacks

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The selang can use its Alien Piping. It then makes two Dagger or Poison Bolt attacks.

actions.name: Dagger
actions.desc: Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d4 + 4) piercing damage plus 10 (3d6) poison damage.

actions.name: Poison Bolt
actions.desc: Ranged Spell Attack: +6 to hit, range 60 ft., one target. Hit: 14 (3d6 + 4) poison damage.

actions.name: Alien Piping
actions.desc: The selang plays one of the following ear-bending melodies on alien pipes. One creature the selang can see within 60 feet of it is the only creature that can hear the melody. The target must succeed on a DC 14 Wisdom saving throw or be affected by the chosen melody.

special_abilities.name: Poisoned Weapons
special_abilities.desc: The selang's weapons are coated with a magical poison. When the selang hits with any weapon, the weapon deals an extra 3d6 poison damage (included in the attack).
